EmailTemplate.name: SLF - EmailTemplate - Salesforce International FSC (Bermuda) Access Request completed Notification App team
EmailTemplate.Body:
Hello Team,

This is to inform you that $applicationName $ops access request for $personID - $personName is completed in the Security Access Management System (SAM).

Regards,
SLGS - Information Security - Identity and Access Management
Life's brighter under the sun
EmailTemplate.Description: Email Template for notifying the requestor that new request is submitted.

Argument.name: personName
Argument.Description: The employee for which the request was submitted

Argument.name: personID
Argument.Description: The employee ID for which the request was submitted

Argument.name: applicationName
Argument.Description: Application for which the request was submitted

EmailTemplate.Subject: Notification => $ops Access Request $accessReqID for $applicationName has been completed for $personID - $personName
